name: Find A Basic Analysis Kit
description: Obtain a basic laboratory analysis kit for the chemist.

dialogue.describe: I need a basic laboratory analysis kit.
dialogue.offer: I've checked the stock here at this house, and it turns out there's a few pieces of equipment I need.  Firstly, I need a reliable way to take measurements and verify results.  If you could get me a basic laboratory analysis kit just to get started, I'd be grateful.  That's the first step towards making everything I brought with me useful.
dialogue.advice: One of those old labs might have one.
dialogue.accepted: I'll be here when you get back.  Good luck!
dialogue.rejected: Well, someone's got to do it.
dialogue.success: Thank you!  I can't wait to get started!
dialogue.failure: That's unfortunate.  I guess I'll have to find it myself.

name: Find Some Hydrochloric Acid
description: Obtain 15 liters of hydrochloric acid for the chemist.
//: Hydrochloric acid is used for basically everything the chemist sells, so trading with them is gated behind this quest.

dialogue.describe: I need 15 liters of hydrochloric acid.
dialogue.offer: The last thing I really need to get going is hydrochloric acid.  It's one of those chemicals that's just perfect for so many things.  An acidifying reagent, and one of the best.  With a large supply of hydrochloric acid, you and I are only a few steps removed from a stable source of antiseptic, fungicide, and even some light explosives!  As the only apparent health authority left, I do have to warn you not to get it on your skin, though.  Find this for me and I'll sell you whatever I can make.
dialogue.advice: You might find large quantities in a warehouse somewhere, but it often got sold as a household cleaner, did you know that?
dialogue.accepted: I'll be here when you get back.  Good luck!
dialogue.rejected: Well, someone's got to do it.
dialogue.inquire: Do you have the hydrochloric acid?
dialogue.success: Wonderful!  I'm sure this will be quite helpful.
dialogue.failure: That's unfortunate.  I guess I'll have to find it myself.

name: Find Some Gasoline
description: Obtain 100 liters of gasoline for the chemist.
//: Gasoline is absurdly valuable post-apocalypse and they're asking for a lot of gasoline.

dialogue.offer: I'm in a bit of a spot.  I keep a generator around here to power all my scientific equipment.  It has a bit of gas in it, but I've burned through that and I can't use most of my tools without power.  This may seem like a lot, but if you could get me 100 liters of gas, I'll pay you back any way I can.
dialogue.advice: I bet the best place to find that much gas is still a gas station.  Bringing it all here is another problem.  You might want one of those big steel drums we used to use to haul off hazardous waste before <the_cataclysm>.
dialogue.accepted: I'll be here when you get back.  Good luck!
dialogue.rejected: Well, someone's got to do it.
dialogue.success: Wonderful!  Thank you so much!  This will keep me running for a long, long time.
dialogue.failure: That's unfortunate.  I guess I'll have to find it myself.

name: Establish A Trade Route
description: Establish trade relations between the chemist and a refugee center, and bring back a writ of the agreement.

dialogue.offer: I was out scavenging recently, and I found one of those old evac shelters.  Turns out the computer was still on and it had an address for a refugee center.  I think my skills might be useful to them, for helping maintain medical supplies and whatnot, so I want you to head over there and see if they're interested.  I'd do it myself, but I need to look after this place.
dialogue.advice: It should be pretty simple making the deal, but I'd recommend taking a car over there myself.
dialogue.accepted: I'll be here when you get back.  Good luck!
dialogue.rejected: Please?  This is really important to me.
dialogue.inquire: What did they say about it?
dialogue.failure: That's unfortunate.  I guess I'll have to find other customers.
